name: CordovaBuild
description: Build a hybrid app project based on the Cordova CLI, Ionic CLI, and/or Tools for Apache Cordova
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Platforms
inputs.helpMarkDown: Cordova platform to build. Valid options include android, ios, windows, and wp8.

inputs.name: archs
inputs.label: Target Architectures
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space delimited list device architectures to build. Valid options for Windows include anycpu, x86, x84, and arm. Valid options for Android include x86 and arm.

inputs.name: cordovaVersion
inputs.label: Cordova Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of Cordova tools to use to build. If not specified, looks at taco.json to determine the version and falls back on a default if no taco.json is found.

inputs.name: antBuild
inputs.label: Force Ant Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Forces Cordova to use Apache Ant to build instead of Gradle on version of Cordova 5.0.0 and up.

inputs.name: iosSigningIdentity
inputs.label: Signing Identity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional signing identity override that should be used to sign the build. **Not required if P12 Certificate File specified.** Defaults to Xcode Project setting. You may need to select Unlock Default Keychain if you use this option.

inputs.name: p12
inputs.label: P12 Certificate File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional relative path to a PKCS12 formated p12 certificate file containing a signing certificate to be used for this build. **Omit Signing Idenity if specified.**

inputs.name: p12pwd
inputs.label: P12 Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to P12 Certificate File if specified. Use a Build Variable to encrypt.

inputs.name: unlockDefaultKeychain
inputs.label: Unlock Default Keychain
inputs.helpMarkDown: Resolve "User interaction is not allowed" errors by unlocking the default keychain.

inputs.name: defaultKeychainPassword
inputs.label: Default Keychain Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to unlock the default keychain when this option is set.

inputs.name: provProfileUuid
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile UUID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional UUID of an installed provisioning profile to be used for this build. Not required if Provisioning Profile File specified. Use separate build tasks with different Schemes or Targets to specify separate provisioning profiles by target in a single workspace (iOS, WatchKit, tvOS).

inputs.name: provProfile
inputs.label: Provisioning Profile File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional relative path to file containing provisioning profile override to be used for this build. **Omit Provisioning Profile UUID if specified.** Use separate build tasks with different Schemes or Targets to specify separate provisioning profiles by target in a single workspace (iOS, WatchKit, tvOS).

inputs.name: removeProfile
inputs.label: Remove Profile After Build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies that the contents of the Provisioning Profile File should be removed from the build agent after the build is complete. **Only check if you are running one agent per user.**

inputs.name: xcodeDeveloperDir
inputs.label: Xcode Developer Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional path to Xcode Developer folder if not the system default. For use when multiple versions of Xcode are installed on a system. Ex: /Applications/Xcode 7.app/Contents/Developer

inputs.name: windowsAppx
inputs.label: Windows APPX Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides type of APPX generated (Windows/Phone 8.1, 10). Valid values include: 8.1-win, 8.1-phone, uap (aka Windows/Phone 10).

inputs.name: args
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional command line arguments that should be used to build.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for build runs. Defaults to the root of the repository.

inputs.name: outputPattern
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path where build output (binaries) will be placed.

inputs.name: targetEmulator
inputs.label: Build for Emulator/Simulator
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build for a emulator or simulator instead of devices.
